item.title: 用 ox-hugo 写博客
item.description: 安装hugo和ox-hugo sudo apt install hugo -y ;; 打开init.el (org +hugo) ; organize your plain life in plain text 快速上手使用 hugo hugo new site my-hugo-site git init git submodule add https://github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo "theme = 'hugo-theme-cleanwhite'" >> config.toml #hugo-theme-cleanwhite theme git submodule add https://github.com/zhaohuabing/hugo-theme-cleanwhite.git themes/hugo-theme-cleanwhite
